trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs during event tracing for Windows (ETW).
trans-unit.target: Windows (ETW) 事件追蹤期間發生錯誤時所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or <see langword="null" /> if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: 導致目前例外狀況發生的例外狀況；如果沒有指定任何的內部例外狀況，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。
